name: Sour Flower
tooltip: Upon death, infects its killer with a poison that deals 3% of its maximum health per second as magic damage for 20 seconds. <br><br><span style='color: #ffcc00'>The poison refreshes on subsequent application. <br><br>10% effectiveness against the King.</span>
